Package rmi.interfaces

Interface RmiServerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RmiServer
    public interface RmiServerInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    A RMI server interface

      • compareDates

        default boolean compareDates​(java.util.GregorianCalendar date1,
                             java.util.GregorianCalendar date2)
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        A method to compare dates. Checks if date1 is before date2
        Parameters:
        date1 - GregorianCalendar of the first date
        date2 - GregorianCalendar of the second date
        Returns:
        true if date1 < date2, else false
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

               java.lang.String name)
        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        method to save the Voting Desks that connect to the RMI Server
        Parameters:
        multicastDesk - The remote Voting Desk Interface
        name - identification of the department that this voting desk is in
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • pingDesks

        void pingDesks​(RmiAdminConsoleInterface adminConsole)
        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Callback where the RMI server gets a request from an Administrator Console about the state of the voting desks and their respective terminals, pings all the desks subscribed to him, and prints the replies on the requester
        Parameters:
        adminConsole - admin console that requested the information
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • vote

        boolean vote​(Vote vote)
      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        A method to add a vote to an election the in the database
        Parameters:
        vote - Vote Object that contains the voting details
        Returns:
        true if the message is communicated to all the subscribed administrator consoles, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

          throws java.rmi.RemoteException

        Parameters:
        electionName - election name of the target Election object
        personID - id of the Person object
        Returns:
        true if the person has already voted on the given election, false otherwise
